titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation concerning coals
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William, III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twenty third day of April, 1691, in the third year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb
